posts.post_title: WTT Nap Lajoie Portrait SGC 10 Hindu Back OFF TO EBAY
posts.post_content:
SGC 10 Lajoie with Brown Hindu back. This card has a nice looking front, however some paper loss and markings on the reverse. I would like to trade this for some PSA only EPDG cards. PSA 2-3 range, or a higher grade if it matches up with this card value wise. Please let me know if there is any interest in trading.

Sent to Ebay.  

Thanks.[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=300211&d=1514423332[/IMG]
